sentence: Democrats have long claimed to be against gerrymandering, but they have no issue with the partisan redrawing of congressional districts when it suits them, according to Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio.
author: Eric Mack
title: Rep. Jordan: Redistricting 'Only Gerrymandering' When GOP Does It

sentence: Ohio Congressman Jim Jordan, ranking member of House Judiciary, is right in the middle of all this and joins me now.
title: 'The Ingraham Angle' on Kamala Harris, Ketanji Brown Jackson

sentence: GOP leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) has called the JCPA “the antithesis of conservatism,” while Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) has warned it would give the media “cartel power.” Sens.
author: Allum Bokhari
title: Lindsey Graham Backs Democrat Led Bailout for Corporate Media

sentence: From The Atlantic: The day after Glenn Youngkin won the Virginia governor’s race last November, a Wall Street Journal headline declared: “Youngkin Makes the GOP the Parents’ Party.” Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio exulted in this new party line on Twitter: “The Republican Party is the party of parents.” Kendi is wrong here.
author: Sam Janney
title: ‘Kinda gives the game away here, no’? Ibram X. Kendi goes straight-up #BlueAnon ranting about white supremacist grooming and LOL
